11.eng-name: The Rites of Hajj (Kitab Al-Manasik Wa'l-Hajj)

hadiths.text: Abu Huraira reported :The Messenger of Allah (SWAS) as saying : A muslim woman must not make a journey of a night unless she is accompanied by a man who is within the prohibited degrees

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْمَرْأَةِ تَحُجُّ بِغَيْرِ مَحْرَمٍ
chapter.eng-name: Regarding A Woman Who Performs Hajj Without A Mahram
